actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Glimpse from the Heavens then three Anointed Claws or Draconic Blasts.

actions.name: Anointed Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage and 22 (5d8) radiant.

actions.name: Draconic Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 29 (5d8+7) radiant. Can choose to deal acid cold fire lightning or poison instead of radiant.

actions.name: Sacred Flame Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Exhales holy fire in a 90' cone. Each creature in that area: 33 (6d10) fire and 33 (6d10) radiant (DC 20 Dex half). Also the holy fire burns away magic ending any spell of 7th-level or lower in the area.

reactions.name: Six-Scaled Aegis
reactions.desc: When it takes damage it gains resistance to that type of damage including the triggering damage for 1 min or until it uses this reaction again.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Knows location of each dragon and each creature with strong connection to dragons such as a sorcerer with the draconic bloodline within 120' of it.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Flies up to half its fly speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Anointed Claws or Draconic Blast attack.

legendary_actions.name: Under Black Wings (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Creates a magical feathered shield around itself or another creature it can see within 120' of it. Target gains +2 to AC and 20 temp hp until the end of zirnitran's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Angelic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 5d8 radiant (included below).

special_abilities.name: Aura of Balance
special_abilities.desc: Affects chance and probability around it. While creature within 20' of it can't have advantage or disadvantage on any ability check attack roll or save. Aura affects zirnitran. At start of each of its turns zirnitran chooses whether this aura is active.

special_abilities.name: Divine Awareness
special_abilities.desc: Knows if it hears a lie.

special_abilities.name: Dragon Watcher
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves vs. dragon breath weapons. No damage if it succeeds on such a save and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Hardened Scales
special_abilities.desc: Any critical hit vs. it becomes a normal hit.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Glimpse from the Heavens
special_abilities.desc: Its eyes flash with the majesty of a solar eclipse. Each creature of its choice that is within 60' of it and that can see it: DC 19 Wis save or frightened for 1 min. Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success. If save is successful or effect ends for it creature is immune to zirnitran's Glimpse of the Heavens for the next 24 hrs. A creature that fails by 5+ is also blinded. Blindness lasts until removed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

special_abilities.name: Secrets of the Hidden Hoard (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Draws upon ages of study and observation and casts one spell of 8th level or lower that appears on the cleric or wizard spell list. Casts the spell as an action regardless of spell's normal casting time.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Wis (DC 21) no material components: At will: detect evil and good invisibility (self only) legend lore thaumaturgy3/day ea: dispel evil and good geas (as an action)1/day ea: antimagic field plane shift
